channel.title: CVE Feed for Extensible Firmware Interface Development Kit (EDK II) -- Extensible Firmware Interface Development Kit (EDK II)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Extensible Firmware Interface Development Kit (EDK II) -- Extensible Firmware Interface Development Kit (EDK II)

item.title: CVE-2018-3613|2024-08-05T04:50:30.189Z -- extensible%20firmware%20interface%20development%20kit%20%28edk%20ii%29 -- extensible%20firmware%20interface%20development%20kit%20%28edk%20ii%29
item.description: Logic issue in variable service module for EDK II/UDK2018/UDK2017/UDK2015 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege, information disclosure and/or denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12179|2024-08-05T08:30:59.601Z -- extensible%20firmware%20interface%20development%20kit%20%28edk%20ii%29 -- extensible%20firmware%20interface%20development%20kit%20%28edk%20ii%29
item.description: Improper configuration in system firmware for EDK II may allow unauthenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege, information disclosure and/or denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12181|2024-08-05T08:30:59.638Z -- extensible%20firmware%20interface%20development%20kit%20%28edk%20ii%29 -- extensible%20firmware%20interface%20development%20kit%20%28edk%20ii%29
item.description: Stack overflow in corrupted bmp for EDK II may allow unprivileged user to potentially enable denial of service or elevation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12180|2024-08-05T08:30:58.414Z -- extensible%20firmware%20interface%20development%20kit%20%28edk%20ii%29 -- extensible%20firmware%20interface%20development%20kit%20%28edk%20ii%29
item.description: Buffer overflow in BlockIo service for EDK II may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege, information disclosure and/or denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12182|2024-08-05T08:30:59.301Z -- extensible%20firmware%20interface%20development%20kit%20%28edk%20ii%29 -- extensible%20firmware%20interface%20development%20kit%20%28edk%20ii%29
item.description: Insufficient memory write check in SMM service for EDK II may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege, information disclosure and/or denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12178|2024-08-05T08:30:59.170Z -- extensible%20firmware%20interface%20development%20kit%20%28edk%20ii%29 -- extensible%20firmware%20interface%20development%20kit%20%28edk%20ii%29
item.description: Buffer overflow in network stack for EDK II may allow unprivileged user to potentially enable escalation of privilege and/or denial of service via network.

item.title: CVE-2018-12183|2024-08-05T08:30:59.824Z -- extensible%20firmware%20interface%20development%20kit%20%28edk%20ii%29 -- extensible%20firmware%20interface%20development%20kit%20%28edk%20ii%29
item.description: Stack overflow in DxeCore for EDK II may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege, information disclosure and/or denial of service via local access.
